outputs.output_descr: This Annual Work Plan seeks to facilitate the linkage between resource input and development results within the context of effective coordination and communication of development results of all UNDP funded projects. Specifically it will support the creation of transformative change by promoting effective coordination for development results, reinforcing monitoring and evaluation, improving strategic partnerships and communication of development , as well as strengthen the capacity of policy and technical human resource within selcted MDA'sto facilitate development effectiveness.
